mutants.code:
def rearrange_array(a, n):
    a = sorted(a)
    arr = []
    i = 1
    j = n - 1
    if n % 2 == 0:
        while i <= j:
            arr.append(a[i])
            arr.append(a[j])
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    else:
        while i < j:
            arr.append(a[i])
            arr.append(a[j])
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        arr.append(a[i])
    arr = list(reversed(arr))
    return arr
